scripts.version: npm run version:sync-internal && npm run release:prepare && git add -A
scripts.release:check: npm run release:prepare && npm run typecheck --workspace=@junction/relay && npm run typecheck --workspace=@junction/server && npm run typecheck --workspace=@junction/cli && npm run build --workspace=@junction/relay && npm run build --workspace=@junction/server && npm run build --workspace=@junction/cli && npm pack --dry-run --workspace=@junction/relay && npm pack --dry-run --workspace=@junction/server && npm pack --dry-run --workspace=@junction/cli
scripts.release:publish: npm publish --workspace=@junction/relay --access public && npm publish --workspace=@junction/server --access public && npm publish --workspace=@junction/cli --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:all:patch && npm run release:check && npm run release:publish && npm run release:push
